scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose up --build
scripts.docker:rebuild:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build
scripts.docker:shell:db: docker compose exec db psql -U postgres -d register_app
scripts.docker:shell:frontend:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec frontend sh
scripts.docker:shell:backend:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec backend sh
scripts.docker:shell:db:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec db psql -U postgres -d register_app
scripts.restart: docker compose down && docker system prune -f && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d && npm run docker:prod
scripts.restart:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker system prune -f && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.restart:fast: docker compose down && docker compose up -d
scripts.restart:fast:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
